data.title: Pentair Customer Service Phone Number (800) 831
data.meta_description: How to contact Pentair customer support at toll-free or general info phone number? Call or write an email to resolve Pentair issues: Product/ Service, Request for Information, Staff. Visit the company website www.pentair.com or help center for more information.
data.text:
Pentair Customer Service is rated at 1.3 out of 5. Consumers who contact the company are mostly dissatisfied. More commonly used way of contact is by phone.

Source Distribution

99% phone 1% email

The best phone number to call Pentair is 8008317133. 82% of consumers used this number to address their issues and concerns.

The average hold time is up to 3 minutes. The longest wait times are on Tuesday, while the shortest are on Sunday. The average call time is 4 minutes.

Be prepared for the call as Pentair may ask you for the following information to identify you as a customer: first and last name, email or phone number.

People call Pentair mainly because of product/ service, request for information and staff.

10% of the consumers who called the companyâ€™s customer support stated that their issues were resolved.

Most customers feel very satisfied after talking to customer service representatives.

The best email to contact Pentair is accessibility@pentair.com. 67% of customers use this email address to address their issues and concerns.
